name: Orange shooter
description:
Hi all and welcome to the Orange Shmup page!

This was created following the LazyDevs Shmup tutorial that you can find at this link:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLea8cjCua_P3Sfq4XJqNVbd1vsWnh7LZd

The Orange planet has been invaded by huge insects and you must fight back!

The fate of our land depends on you...

 

Controls:

Arrows to move 

X : spreadshot 

O : laser (slowdown movement speed) 

While not shooting you attract the pick-ups

How to score:

Destroy the enemies, collect stars and graze bullets and enemies to gain points. The score multiplier will be increased by one each time you graze, but this will only last a couple of seconds.

Blue bullets can be cancelled by destroying the enemies, don't shoot to activate the vacuum cleaner and get more points! 

Graze the bullets to increase the score multiplier and get an incredible amount of points!!! Like Over 9000!

How to play:

I really don't know, I mean I am bad at this kind of games.

Remember the 5 D : Dodge Duck Dip Dive and Dodge!

It's like a bullet hell!

 

Credits:

Krystman - For the tutorial and the advice 

Squidlight, DJ Clemmer, Zach Attakk, Katch33, LouieChapm, mistertroglodyte, Aktane, otto_piramuthu - From the LazyDevs community for the help, the testing and the code snippets 

bikibird - For the awesome Speako8 (voice synth) 

Prof. Marco Naretto - For the help with the music

And my family for being awesome
